statement.title: Content
statement.content: There are three marines in wilyin's base. Their positions form a right triangle.Now wilyin get another marine,he want to put it on some place to form a rectangle with the former three marines.where should he put it on?

statement.title: Standard Input
statement.content:
The first line of the input contains an integer $T$ which means the number of test cases. Then $T$ lines follow, each line consists of $6$ positive integers $x\_1, y\_1, x\_2, y\_2, x\_3, y\_3$ which means the positions of these three marines.

You may assume the absolute value of coordinate not exceed $3000$.

statement.title: Standard Output
statement.content: For each case, print the coordinate of the forth marine on a single line.

statement.title: Samples
statement.content:
Input Output
2 0 0 1 0 0 1 0 1 0 -1 1 01 1 -1 0
